[++Slot 1 Character Modifier Codes++]
[Slot 2&Slot 1 are Siblings]
B06D9F40 00000000
D9000000 000001F4
D6000000 000000B4
D2000000 00000000

[Slot 2 is Slot 1's parent]
DD000000 00000048
B06D9F40 00000000
D9000000 000001DC
B00000B4 00000000
D6000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000088
B06D9F40 00000000
D9000000 000001DC
B00000B4 00000000
D6000000 00000014
D0000000 00000000
{Only works on units with parents.\nStart+Up = Father\nStart+Down = Mother}

[Einherjar/Amiibo real unit]
B06D9F40 00000000
000000B0 00000000
D2000000 00000000

[Copy Slot 2's hair to Slot 1]
B06D9F40 00000000
D9000000 0000027C
D6000000 0000013C
D2000000 00000000

[Character is of royal blood]

00000000 00800000
00000004 00000008

D2000000 00000000

[Remove shield/royal blood]

00000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000
